citations.narrative:
There is a small area near the ground on the side wall of warthog shelter where the metal siding is torn.This area
may cause injury to the animals if they contact it . The shelter wall must be repaired or replaced and maintained in
good condition to protect the animals from injury . CORRECT BY : 4-8-17
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the owner.

narrative:
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
There is a small area  near the ground on the side wall of warthog shelter where the metal siding is torn.This area
may cause injury to the animals if they contact it . The shelter wall must be repaired or replaced and maintained in
good condition to protect the animals from injury .  CORRECT BY : 4-8-17
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the owner.

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
